name.baseName: Aluminum ingot casting ; Primary aluminum ingot ; Liquid primary aluminum ; 2007
铝锭铸造 ; 原生铝锭 ; 液态原铝 ; 2007年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The primary aluminum ingot casting process described in this data set is used to produce aluminum ingots from liquid primary aluminum. These ingots are then typically used as a high-quality raw material in the production of various aluminum-based products, including components for the automotive industry, aerospace applications, construction materials, and electrical conductors.
本数据集描述的原生铝锭铸造工艺用于从液态原生铝制造铝锭。这些铝锭通常作为高质量的原材料用于生产各种铝基产品，包括用于汽车工业的零部件、航空航天应用、建筑材料和电导体。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The primary aluminum ingot casting process described in this data set is used to produce aluminum ingots from liquid primary aluminum. These ingots are then typically used as a high-quality raw material in the production of various aluminum-based products, including components for the automotive industry, aerospace applications, construction materials, and electrical conductors.
本数据集描述的原生铝锭铸造工艺用于从液态原生铝制造铝锭。这些铝锭通常作为高质量的原材料用于生产各种铝基产品，包括用于汽车工业的零部件、航空航天应用、建筑材料和电导体。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), ensure that you account for the specific year of publication (2007) as technology and efficiencies may have evolved since then. Users should also note that the PA data draw from statistical sources, while the SA data primarily come from literature. The background data originates from the Chinese localized LCA database – CAS RCEES 2018. It is recommended to check for consistency with other data sources and consider the relevance of the technological applicability of the data based on the specific characteristics of the region or system under study.
在使用该数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）时，请确保您考虑到数据发布的特定年份（2007年），因为自那时以来技术和效率可能已有所发展。用户还应注意，PA数据来自统计数据源，而SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据来自中国本土化的LCA数据库——中科院生态环境研究中心2018年的CAS RCEES。建议与其他数据源核对一致性，并根据所研究区域或系统的特定特征考虑数据的技术适应性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
